```sh
# returns True if bpdu b1 is better than bpdu b2
def  better(b1, b2):
    return ((b1.R < b2.R) or
            ((b1.R == b2.R) and (b1.c < b2.c)) or
            ((b1.R == b2.R) and (b1.c == b2.c) and (b1.T < b2.T)) or
            ((b1.R == b2.R) and (b1.c == b2.c) and (b1.T == b2.T) and (b1.p < b2.p))) 
```
